label: Toast
description: Toast is used to display messages in an overlay.

props.label: ToastProps
props.description: Defines valid properties in Toast component. In addition to these, all properties of HTMLDivElement can be used in this component.

values.name: class
values.description: CSS classes to add to root element.

values.name: id
values.description: Toast identifier. Used by showToast to sent Toast messages to this Toast

values.name: position
values.description: Position of the toast in viewport, valid values are 'center', 'top-center', 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-center', 'bottom-left', 'bottom-right'.

values.name: pt
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

values.name: ptOptions
values.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

values.name: style
values.description: Style to add to root element.

values.name: unstyled
values.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

values.name: root
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the root's DOM element.

types.label: Props types
types.description: Defines types used by properties of the Toast component.
